description.value:
>@UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.class-features.Item.G8R4eOCadeKA4lof]{Chaldiralist}

You punch up harder than others can punch down. Against any foe you’ve witnessed deal damage to an ally or to a creature whose level is at least 4 lower than the foe’s CR, your next successful melee attack against that foe before the end of your next turn deals additional damage equal to 1d4 + half your soldier level. Alternatively, you can treat that foe as @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.conditions.Item.MZ8OoH1GE9qDMyCD]{Flat-Footed} against your next @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.rules.JournalEntry.U37n5tY5hn1ctzQL.JournalEntryPage.R33uiOMesYP0ISWl#bull-rush]{Bull Rush}, @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.rules.JournalEntry.U37n5tY5hn1ctzQL.JournalEntryPage.R33uiOMesYP0ISWl#reposition]{Reposition}, or @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.rules.JournalEntry.U37n5tY5hn1ctzQL.JournalEntryPage.R33uiOMesYP0ISWl#trip]{Trip} combat maneuver you attempt against them before the end of your next turn.

modifiers.name: Bully Battler Damage
modifiers.notes: Only active against any foe you’ve witnessed deal damage to an ally or to a creature whose level is at least 4 lower than the foe’s CR
